docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_1: The difficulty index is equivalent to the question success percentage.
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_2: It is calculated with the number of candidates who answered correctly divided by the total number of respondents.
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_3: If the index is high, it is that the question is easy. Conversely, if an index is low, the question is difficult.
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_4: This index does not take into account students who did not see the question.
docimology_discrimination_coefficient_he: The coefficient of discrimination of a question is a coefficient of correlation between the results obtained with the question and those obtained with the whole test.
A positive value highlights a question that supports the best, while a negative value means that the learners with the worst scores have responded the most.
When a question has a negative CD, it means that it penalizes the best. It is therefore best to avoid such questions.
It should be noted that if all students get the same score on a question, the coefficient will not be defined.
docimology_note_gauges_help: Because of the possibility of modifying the exercises while copies have already been made, the notes are calculated and then reported on 100.
duplicate_this_question: <input type ="text" name='nbq' value='0' size='2' /> 次这个题目 (最多10次)
duration_help: 输入 0 = 无限持续时间
editor_invalid_no_save_desc: 由于缺失数据或存在无效数据，测验无法保存. 请在保存前解决这些问题.
editor_not_validating_desc: Work in progress: 有些信息丢失或需要更改.
editor_validating_desc: 一些错误或缺失信息阻止了数据存储.
error_no_step_found: 在获取当前步骤时出现了问题.
exercise_alert_break: 这个测验不允许被打断. 你的答题将被视为已经结束 !
exercise_finished_attempts: [0, 1] 你完成了 %count% 次尝试|]1,Inf[  你完成了 %count% 次尝试
exercise_tries: [0, 1] 你尝试了 %count% 次|]1,Inf[ 你尝试了 %count% 次
exo_empty_user_can_edit: 这个测验是空的. 请编辑并发布以使其获得内容.
exo_empty_user_read_only: 这个测验是空的，且尚未被其作者配置. 请过一段时间再来.
explain_coeff_dis0: 这些复制必须有同样的题目才能计算其判别系数.
explain_coeff_dis1: Analysis of the relevance of the questions, this correlation coefficient ranges from -1 to +1.
explain_coeff_dis2: The questions with a discriminatory coefficient between 0.35 and 0.65 maximize the discrimination of students.
explain_coeff_dis3: Questions which have a negative index point a discrepancy: the best students fail these questions, the lowest pass these questions.
explain_measure_difficulty: 难度系数 = 成功完成该题目的百分比.
export_qti_exercise: 将测验的题目导出为QTI表格
feedback_answer_check: 答案正确时的反馈 (可选)
fixed_failure_above_success_error: 在通过时，这个值应低于分数.
fixed_score_choice_at_least_one_correct_: 必须核对到至少一个正确答案.
fixed_success_under_failure_error: 在失败时，这个值应高于分数.

graphic_error_no_positive_solution: 至少一个答案区需要有正分数.

info_duplicate_question: 要复制题目，你必须插入一个 0 到 10 之间的整数.
info_exercise_never_published: 这个测验还未发布. 管理员可以添加题目, 试运行测验或删除答卷. 发布后, 学生将可以答题，且答卷将无法被删除.
info_mark: The potential penalties have to be counted during your notation.
info_measure_difficulty: 这个系数不会计入未见过相应题目的学生（只计算应对该问题作答的学生数）.
info_search_type: 如果想按类型搜索, 你需要使用下列关键词

instruction_matching: To set your correspondence, choose the number of one or more proposals to associate in the column entitled "Correspondence".
